thread.title: Stonebridge Companies Hampton Inn Boulder Louisville Invites Colorado to Pints in the Park this August
thread.title_full: Stonebridge Companies Hampton Inn Boulder Louisville Invites Colorado to Pints in the Park this August

author: Maggie Mistovich
title: Stonebridge Companies Hampton Inn Boulder Louisville Invites Colorado to Pints in the Park this August
text:
Hampton Inn Boulder Louisville welcomes locals and guests alike to Louisvilleâ€™s Pints in the Park Saturday, August 29th. This event has many different local beers from 22 breweries, restaurants and food trucks and helps support local Colorado businesses. Anyone 21 years and older may attend, and tickets can be purchased online starting at $30. Ticket prices include all samples and a souvenir pint glass. Dogs are not allowed at the event for their safety and infants must be worn, no strollers are permitted. For more information and to purchase tickets online, please visit http://www.pintsintheparkco.com . Hampton Inn Boulder Louisville welcomes guests to stay the night after the event and enjoy more of what Louisville has to offer. With free hot breakfast daily, complimentary Wi-Fi, fitness center, indoor pool, comfortable hotel rooms and more; Hampton Inn has something for everyone. Guest rooms include king or queen rooms, king suites and accessible rooms, which are available upon request. For reservations and more information on the Hampton Inn Boulder Louisville, please visit http://www.louisvillehampton.com or call (303) 666-7700. The Hampton Inn Boulder Louisville is proudly managed by Stonebridge Companies in Denver, Colorado.
Founded in 1991 by Navin C. Dimond, Stonebridge Companies is a privately owned, innovative hotel owner, operator and developer headquartered near Denver, Colorado. The diverse listing of properties includes select-service, extended-stay, mid-scale and full-service hotels in markets throughout the U.S. For detailed information, visit our website at http://www.sbcos.com .
